DOC.brief_summary: The relevance of BBB and IB permeability changes as a major precipitating cause for cognitive and digestive dysfunction in the military stress setting.
DOC.brief_title: Changes in the Permeability of the Blood Brain Barrier and Intestinal Barrier in Humans During Conditions of Stress and Immune Activation: in Vivo Studies
DOC.criteria: Healthy male troops (aged 1850 yrs) scheduled to be engaged in a protracted multiday stressful field exercises. Significantly systemic disease, including cardiovascular, psychiatric, neurological (including polyneuropathies) and endocrine disease including diabetes mellitus. No written informed consent obtained from subject.
